user.title: Setup Water Residuum
user.description: Configure the integration to measure water consumption between 10L meter ticks (0-9.9999L).

data_description.name: Name for this integration (e.g. 'Kitchen Water')
data_description.temp_entity: Sensor that measures water temperature in the pipe
data_description.total_entity: Smart meter water counter (counts in 10L steps)
data_description.lastsync_entity: Optional: Timestamp of last sync from meter
data_description.rssi_entity: Optional: RSSI signal strength from meter
data_description.total_unit: Choose L if your meter counts in liters, m³ if in cubic meters

abort.already_configured: This integration has already been configured

init.title: Advanced Options
init.description: K-factors are auto-calibrated! Only change if you know what you're doing.

data_description.k_warm: Conversion factor for warm pipe (≥16°C). Auto-learns at every 10L tick!
data_description.k_cold: Conversion factor for cold pipe (≤12°C). Auto-learns at every 10L tick!
data_description.t_warm: Temperature threshold for 'warm'. K-Warm is used at this temperature.
data_description.t_cold: Temperature threshold for 'cold'. K-Cold is used at this temperature.
data_description.clip: Maximum temperature gradient to prevent overshooting.
data_description.max_residuum_l: Upper limit for residuum. Should stay at 10L.
